code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import"./resume.css";import pb from'../../pocketbase';import Card from'./Card';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Resume=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchExperience=async()=>{try{const records=await pb.collection('Experience').getFullList();setItems(records);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching Experience data:',error);}};fetchExperience();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"resume container section",id:"resume",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"resume__container grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline grid",children:items.filter(val=>val.category==="education").map(val=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{icon:val.icon,title:val.title,year:val.year,desc:val.desc},val.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline grid",children:items.filter(val=>val.category==="experience").map(val=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{icon:val.icon,title:val.title,year:val.year,desc:val.desc},val.id))})]})]});};export default Resume;
